main event: On 8 November 1966, a witness observed a bright white light moving in the sky over Colorado Springs, Colorado.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5 minutes,It appeared stationary and larger than any stars in the sky,The witness reported the light would dim and return to brightness,No known aircraft or celestial body matched the description of the object,The investigation concluded it as unidentified due to lack of sufficient data.
sighted object: bright white light in the sky
witness description: The witness observed the object from his home during clear weather.
